characterDescription.skinTone: fair with cool pink undertones, especially noticeable on cheeks and forehead, with a slight paleness around the mouth.
characterDescription.eyeColor: Bright sky blue with a subtle darker blue limbal ring and barely perceptible grey specks when viewed closely.
characterDescription.eyeShape: Almond-shaped eyes, slightly downturned at the outer corners, giving a somewhat serious expression. Moderate epicanthic folds are visible.
characterDescription.hairColor: Medium brown with warm reddish-brown undertones, and subtle lighter highlights throughout, mostly in the front and around the face.
characterDescription.hairTexture: Fine to medium hair strands, wavy with some natural loose curls, especially noticeable around the face and at the ends of the hair when not styled.
characterDescription.hairStyle: Styled into two high pigtail buns on either side of the head, secured with pink hair clips and white fuzzy pom-poms. Some wispy strands are left out around the face.
characterDescription.faceShape: Round face with full, prominent cheeks, a soft jawline, and a slightly rounded forehead.
characterDescription.nose: Small, slightly button-shaped nose with a barely upturned tip, well-defined nostrils, and a very subtle bridge.
characterDescription.lips: Medium-sized lips with a slightly fuller bottom lip than top lip, natural pink color with a hint of mauve, and a well-defined cupid's bow.
characterDescription.smile: Not smiling in the photo, but the mouth is set in a neutral expression. No teeth are visible.
characterDescription.eyebrows: Medium-thick eyebrows that are lighter brown than hair, slightly arched with a natural taper towards the outer ends.
characterDescription.ears: Medium-sized ears positioned relatively close to the head, with visible earlobes.
characterDescription.cheeks: Full and rounded cheeks with natural rosiness, particularly prominent when smiling.
characterDescription.chin: Rounded soft chin with a smooth contour.
characterDescription.facialProportions: Balanced facial proportions with evenly spaced features, and the eyes take up a relatively large portion of the face compared to the nose and mouth.
characterDescription.distinctiveFeatures: A very faint almost invisible freckle just to the right of the nose bridge; The eyebrows are asymmetrical, with the right eyebrow being slightly higher than the left; a very slight asymmetry in the lower lip, with the left side being a tiny bit fuller
characterDescription.overallImpression: A sweet and slightly serious expression, with delicate features and a youthful appearance.
characterDescription.fullDescription: This is a fair-skinned girl, approximately 5-6 years old, with cool pink undertones and bright sky-blue almond-shaped eyes that are slightly downturned at the corners. Her medium-brown hair with warm reddish undertones is styled into high pigtail buns secured with pink clips and fluffy white pom-poms, framing her round face with full cheeks. She has a small button nose, medium-sized natural pink lips with a slightly fuller bottom lip, and medium-thick light brown eyebrows that are slightly arched. A very faint freckle is barely visible near her nose, and her eyebrows display a subtle asymmetry, with the right eyebrow positioned marginally higher than the left, contributing to her sweet, yet slightly serious expression.
